txt.en: The Sûhalar Easterlings have constructed an encampment at the base of the northern Rammas. Ingold proposes an effort to cripple the forces gathered there.
Jal Vârsha can be found along the the northern Rammas in southern Talath Anor.\n\nNow that their horses are gone, you should burn their tents.
Ingold can be found at the northern gate of the Rammas.\n\nYou should speak with Ingold.
'Your efforts preceded you. I can see the smoke from here! Yet again, you are a most impressive warrior.'

'The Sûhalar encampment against the northern Rammas must be stopped. Free their horses to stop further patrols from searching for the Rohirrim, then burn their tents to plunge the encampment into chaos. I'm counting on you.'
Jal Vârsha can be found along the northern Rammas in southern Talath Anor.\n\nYou should free their horses.
